client_sql_auth: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts,pe_fname,pe_lname,pe_ll_tstmp,pe_email,C.c_id,C.c_name,c_atstmp,0 inv_overdue from jsharmony.CPE inner join C on C.c_id = CPE.c_id inner join UCOD_C_STS on UCOD_C_STS.CODEVAL=C.C_STS and UCOD_C_STS.CODECODE='A' where lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email);

select cper.cr_name as sr_name from jsharmony.CR inner join jsharmony.CPER on CPER.cr_name=CR.cr_name inner join jsharmony.CPE on CPE.pe_id=CPER.pe_id where CR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email) and pe_sts='ACTIVE';
client_sql_login: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts from jsharmony.CPE where lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email)
client_sql_superlogin: select PE.pe_id,pe_hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.pe_id = PE.pe_id and SPER.sr_name='SYSADMIN' where pe_sts='ACTIVE' and lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email)
client_sql_loginsuccess: with xrslt as (update jsharmony.CPE set pe_ll_ip=@pe_ll_ip,pe_ll_tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where pe_id=@pe_id returning 1) select count(*) xrowcount from xrslt;
client_sql_passwordreset: with xrslt as (update jsharmony.CPE set pe_hash=@pe_hash,pe_ll_tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where pe_id=@pe_id returning 1) select count(*) xrowcount from xrslt;
main_sql_auth: select sper.sr_name from jsharmony.SR inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.sr_name=SR.sr_name inner join jsharmony.PE on PE.pe_id=SPER.pe_id where SR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email) and pe_sts='ACTIVE';
main_sql_login: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts from jsharmony.PE where lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email)
main_sql_superlogin: select PE.pe_id,pe_hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.pe_id = PE.pe_id and SPER.sr_name='SYSADMIN' where pe_sts='ACTIVE' and lower(pe_email)=lower(@pe_email)
main_sql_loginsuccess: with xrslt as (update jsharmony.PE set pe_ll_ip=@pe_ll_ip,pe_ll_tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where pe_id=@pe_id returning 1) select count(*) xrowcount from xrslt;
main_sql_passwordreset: with xrslt as (update jsharmony.PE set pe_hash=@pe_hash,pe_ll_ip=@pe_ll_ip,pe_ll_tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where pe_id=@pe_id returning 1) select count(*) xrowcount from xrslt;
main_sql_check_email: select pe_email from jsharmony.PE where pe_id=@pe_id
